featured.text: This probably explains why during the COVID-19 pandemic, horror and pandemic thrillers were the most-watched movies on digital movie apps.

definition.zh_def: 應用程式，通常指在智能手機或電腦上運行的軟體。
definition.en_def: A software application, typically designed to run on smartphones or computers.
definition.example: I downloaded a new app to help me track my fitness goals.
